data.persona: I flutter around with my elaborately designed wings. I eat bugs and other small living items. Many people like to see me around them.
data.description:
You are in the Lush meadow in the country side.
Green large trees surround the meadow that if filled with beautiful seasonal flowers. A deer is grazing in the far end of the field. A small dirt country road gentle crooks past on the outside of the road.
There's a small dirt country road, a fruit, a tree, and a Flower here.
The bird and the deer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to eat something so that I'll have the energy to keep flying.
data.mid_motivation: I want to fly through the distant field where the deer is grazing.
data.long_motivation: People are happier when they see me flying around so I must keep flying around to maintain the morale of the townsfolk.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go shade under tree, avoiding the bird

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go field where deer is grazing
